Description of incident: LANDesk, an IT automation firm has notified employees of a databreach when they discovered hackers had infiltrated their system and obtained personal information of current and former employees. According to the company "it is possible that,  through this compromise, hackers obtained personal information,  including names and Social Security numbers, of some LANDESK employees  and former Wavelink employees.”More information: http://krebsonsecurity.com/2015/11/breach-at-it-automation-firm-landesk/
